experiences.description: Geotechnical expert analyzing field and laboratory soil investigation results for various construction projects across Indonesia.
achievements: Analyzed soil investigation results for hospital projects in West Java
Conducted geotechnical analysis for infrastructure projects including bridges and office buildings
Performed soil investigation for industrial facilities including Pertamina tank projects
Led geotechnical analysis for mining feasibility studies including Red Mud Area and Smelter Area Phase II Alumina projects
Conducted permeability studies for dam projects in Lampung

experiences.description: Geotechnical Engineer performing design and analysis for various projects including mining construction and infrastructure development.
achievements: Performing geotechnical design and analysis for various projects
Conducting soil investigation and foundation design
Providing expert consultation on geotechnical engineering

experiences.description: Teaching geotechnical courses in Civil Engineering department, sharing industry experience with students.
achievements: Teaching geotechnical engineering courses
Developing curriculum for civil engineering program
Mentoring students in geotechnical design projects

experiences.description: Led detailed engineering design for port infrastructure projects in Papua and Maluku provinces.
achievements: Team Leader for Detailed Engineering Design of Depapre Port, Papua Province (2022-2024)
Team Leader for Detailed Engineering Design of Lerokis Port, Maluku Province (2021-2022)
Provided geotechnical expertise for port infrastructure projects

experiences.description: Geotechnical Engineer performing design and analysis for various projects including mining construction.
achievements: Performed design and analysis for mining construction projects
Conducted geotechnical investigations and analysis
Developed foundation design recommendations

experiences.description: Responsible for supervision, inspection, and soil mechanics test results in the laboratory.
achievements: Led laboratory operations and testing procedures
Supervised soil mechanics testing and quality control
Managed laboratory team and ensured test accuracy
